qas.question: What possession of Midna does Ganondorf destroy?
Where does Link depart from at the end of the game?
Which character helps Link get Ganondorf off of his horse?
To what part of his body does Link deliver the killing blow to Ganondorf?
Who resurrects Midna after the fight with Ganondorf?
What possession of Link does Ganondorf destroy?
Where does Ganondorf depart from at the end of the game?
Which character helps Midna get Ganandorf off of her horse?
To what part of his body does Zelda deliver the killing blow to Ganondorf?
Who resurrects Zelda after the fight with Ganondorf?

context: Ganondorf then revives, and Midna teleports <a5_0>Link and <a2_0>Zelda<a5_0/><a2_0/> outside the castle so she can hold him off with the Fused Shadows. However, as Hyrule Castle collapses, it is revealed that Ganondorf was victorious as he crushes <a6_0>Midna's <a0_0><b8_0>helmet<b8_0/><a6_0/><a0_0/>. Ganondorf engages Link on horseback, and, assisted by <b10_0>Zelda<b10_0/> and the <a4_0><b12_0>Light Spirits<b12_0/><a4_0/>, Link eventually knocks Ganondorf off his horse and they duel on foot before Link strikes down Ganondorf and plunges the Master Sword into his <a3_0><b11_0>chest<b11_0/><a3_0/>. With Ganondorf dead, the Light Spirits not only bring Midna back to life, but restore her to her true form. After bidding farewell to Link and Zelda, Midna returns home before destroying the <a7_0>Mirror of Twilight<a7_0/> with a tear to maintain balance between Hyrule and the Twilight Realm. Near the end, as Hyrule Castle is rebuilt, Link is shown leaving <a1_0><b9_0>Ordon Village<b9_0/><a1_0/> heading to parts unknown.
